name: Harambe Run
description:
After Harambe dreams of him getting killed, he goes on an epic journey searching for his own destiny. On his way he is going to let the kids pay for their actions. 

Controls:

AD = Left & Right

Space = Jump

Left Mouse Click = Shoot

CTRL = Restart level

ESC = Main Menu

Software used:

- Game Maker Studio 2

- GIMP
